text: Hiwassee College was a private liberal arts college in Madisonville, Tennessee. It was founded in 1849. The college offered both associate and bachelor's degrees. Most of its associate degree graduates went on to complete bachelor's degrees elsewhere. The college closed on May 10, 2019 because of financial issues. == References == Category:19th-century establishments in Tennessee Category:1849 establishments in the United States Category:2019 disestablishments in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in Tennessee
title: Hiwassee College
